# Ranking the Manifesto Guys

They are all Anglo Saxon Blokes, so how can we rank them?

I will use the following metrics:

- Celebrity (higher is better)
- Object Oriented-ness (lower is better)
- How Much They Sold Out (lower also better)

Thomas coined the phrases 'Code Kata' and 'DRY' (Don't Repeat Yourself),
